title.rendered: Loss Adjusting duo sign KSA cooperation agreement

content.rendered:
International players AqualisBraemar and Middle East Loss Adjusting Co.Ltd (MEA), a Miller International associate company,  have entered into a cooperation agreement to strengthen MEA’s claims services which it provides to the local insurance market in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.

Middle East International Loss Adjusting Co. Ltd, licensed by the Saudi Arabian Monetary Authority (SAMA) has a well-established presence and operates throughout the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.  

“By virtue of this Cooperation Agreement, MEA has access to the vast range of AqualisBraemar’s specialist engineering services, particularly with regard to the energy, power and maritime industries,” says Hussain Al Dossary, Chairman of MEA. 

AqualisBraemar is a leading engineering, marine and adjusting consultancy to the renewables, maritime, oil & gas and power & utilities industries. The company is part of Oslo-listed energy consultancy group AqualisBraemar ASA. 

AqualisBraemar’s international loss adjusters specialize in the investigation and resolution of insurance claims and commercial disputes. Key services include loss adjusting, expert witness, dispute resolution and risk assessment. 

“Our plan is to work closely together with MEA, providing support services to our local partner as may be required from time to time in KSA,” says Dirk Jol, head of AqualisBraemar’s loss adjusting division in the Middle East and India.

For further information, please contact:

Endre Johansen, Corporate Communications AS
Telephone: +47 41 61 06 05
Email: endre.johansen@corpcom.no

About AqualisBraemar ASA

AqualisBraemar ASA (OSE: Aqua) offers independent consultancy services to the offshore energy (oil & gas and renewables), shipping and insurance industries. The group employs specialist engineers, naval architects, master mariners, loss adjusters and technical consultants in 33 countries worldwide. AqualisBraemar ASA operates under three brands:
  • AqualisBraemar: a leading adjusting, marine and offshore consultancy to the energy, shipping and insurance industries
  • AqualisBraemar Yacht Services: a specialised marine consultant to the superyacht market
  • OWC: an independent consultancy to the offshore renewables sector

jetpack-related-posts.title: AqualisBraemar enters South American partnership
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: AqualisBraemar has entered into a strategic partnership agreement with Quorumad S.A. to cooperate on projects in the energy sector in Colombia, Ecuador and Peru.

jetpack-related-posts.title: AqualisBraemar appoints new head of Adjusting in Middle East and India
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: AqualisBraemar has appointed Dirk Jol to head up the group’s adjusting division in the Middle East and India.

jetpack-related-posts.title: AqualisBraemar strengthens Latin American operation
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: AqualisBraemar is strengthening its Latin American operation with the appointment of a new director for the region.

jetpack-related-posts.title: AqualisBraemar enters Chinese offshore aquaculture partnership
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: AqualisBraemar and “East China Sea Fisheries Research Institute, Chinese Academy of Fishery Sciences (ECSFRI-CAFS)” have entered into an agreement regarding the research and development of offshore aquaculture concepts and solutions.

jetpack-related-posts.title: New Europe and West Africa head for AqualisBraemar’s adjusting unit
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: AqualisBraemar has appointed Allan Kelly to lead the group’s adjusting division in Europe and West Africa.

jetpack-related-posts.title: AqualisBraemar to ramp up international adjusting business
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: AqualisBraemar is set to launch an international recruitment drive to ramp up its adjustment business serving all aspects of the oil, gas, power and marine sectors.
